channel.title: How to add a Npc and Fix Health and Drop?
channel.description: [b]eeeh This may sound a little nooby but how do i Make a Npc's Health a Certian Amount and what it drops..?[/b]

item.title: How to add a Npc and Fix Health and Drop?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

but allstar is just like czar and most sources are czared based so it should work anyway unless your using devolution, delta, rs2dv, yz’s base, it should work on most czar bases anyways

item.title: How to add a Npc and Fix Health and Drop?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

to change a npcs health go to npc.cfg and it wil have the npcs combat and health in it

for drops i am not sure on wich way they load for allstar but theres to ways to do it you can set them in npcdrops.cfg and add to that or you can change them in item2.java, item3.java or item4.java and then add those to npchanlder.java i am pritty sure thats the two ways on allstar

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a Npc and Fix Health and Drop?
